publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-790# David Mundell: Development of Carlisle Airport-That the Parliament welcomes the potential development of Carlisle Airport; believes that enabling the airport to provide new commercial flights, serving not only Cumbria and Northumberland but also Dumfries and Galloway and the Scottish Borders, will be beneficial to commercial activity in those regions; further believes that it will assist in the growth of tourism in the south of Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should do all it can to urge the Northwest Development Agency to support the development. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Bill Aitken*, Alex Fergusson*, Murdo Fraser*
S2M-790# Development of Carlisle Airport (lodged on 14 January 2004) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mary Scanlon*, Phil Gallie*, Mr David Davidson*

S2M-790# David Mundell: Development of Carlisle Airport-That the Parliament welcomes the potential development of Carlisle Airport; believes that enabling the airport to provide new commercial flights, serving not only Cumbria and Northumberland but also Dumfries and Galloway and the Scottish Borders, will be beneficial to commercial activity in those regions; further believes that it will assist in the growth of tourism in the south of Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should do all it can to urge the Northwest Development Agency to support the development. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank, Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Murdo Fraser, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr David Davidson
S2M-790# Development of Carlisle Airport (lodged on 14 January 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-790# Development of Carlisle Airport (lodged on 14 January 2004) Christine Grahame*
